name: file_operations
description: Perform basic file operations (read, write, list files)

input_parameters.name: operation
input_parameters.description: Operation type: read, write, list, or exists

input_parameters.name: filename
input_parameters.description: File path relative to temp directory

output_parameters.name: file_content
output_parameters.description: Content of the file (for read operations)

output_parameters.name: operation_status
output_parameters.description: Success or error status of the operation
